explains: n. 硬木，硬木材；[植][林] 阔叶树
wordGroup: hardwood flooring n. 硬木地板，实木地板

sentences.en: His feet echoed on the hardwood floor.
sentences.cn: 他的脚步声在硬木地板上回响着。

sentences.en: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.cn: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

sentences.en: The easiest way to propagate a vine is to take hardwood cuttings.
sentences.cn: 繁殖葡萄藤最容易的办法就是采取硬木扦插。
